siteMetadata.title: Quick tips by Anubhav Srivastava
siteMetadata.subtitle: Personal quick tips for Web Developers

frontmatter.title: Admire beautiful images of your source code
frontmatter.description: Are you impressed by code screenshot that you see twitter and online? and wonder, which IDE theme are people using? or you want to share your professional awesome code screenshot with colleague? Here is the tool everyone is using!

frontmatter.title: Manage all of your npm packages for a project from UI
frontmatter.description: Set of tools that provide GUI interfaces for managing you npm packages, both global and project.

frontmatter.title: Watch your Jest based test cases on browser via Majestic
frontmatter.description: Majestic is GUI tool for jest based test suites with major functionality that jest offers via CLI

frontmatter.title: Extend Github.com site features and functionalities on the browser
frontmatter.description: A set of browser extensions to help you get best out of your open source site - Github.com

frontmatter.title: Spell check your code using `code spell checker` on VS Code
frontmatter.description: A basic spell checker that works well with camelCase code. The goal of this spell checker is to help with catching common spelling errors while keeping the number of false positives low.

frontmatter.title: Run VS Code on remote server using `code-server`
frontmatter.description: Coder is an open source remote development environment serving Visual Studio Code. Improve your workflow and explore the capabilities of your local development machine.

frontmatter.title: Better view to read an article via Reader/Distill Mode
frontmatter.description: Want to remove distractions from the websites you are just trying to read? or read an articles/blog in distraction free view? Try Reader/Distill mode.

frontmatter.title: Download Youtube videos with "youtube-dl"
frontmatter.description: Download Youtube videos with `youtube-dl`, a CLI based utility to download videos in desired format, download entire playlist, download only new videos and what not.

frontmatter.title: Stick your notes on any site
frontmatter.description: Take your own notes for a page of a site or anywhere on the web via Firefox Addon. The notes persist for that site for future use.

frontmatter.title: Become a better developer, one tab at a time.
frontmatter.description: Gain new developer skills every time you open a New Tab! Choose which programming languages you want to get better at in options and get smarter every time you open a New Tab. All you need is 30 seconds to read and understand snippets of code and improve your knowledge.
